title: Do you have 2 or 3 big dogs- Great for couple on the move
posting_body: Just finish this 40' by 6' wide by 6' tall completely enclosed dog run that has 2 separate doggie doors so your dogs can walk themselves whenever they want or play or enjoy the outdoors even when you're not there.
Half of the dog run also has a has a tarp system that keeps keeps snow and rain out of the dog run
And also provides shade for them..
No Cats please.
Installed high end Astroturf for the  Comfort of your canines and there's never mud in your house.
Even have a cold and hot water line in the dog run for easy cleaning of the atro turf.

Also just installed 2 brand new 50 gallon hot water heaters so has indoor hot tub for 2 upstairs and the 2 laundry centers will never have an issue with  with having hot water there with  a 100 gallons on reserve at all times.
Also have a 4 person Hot tub with built in lounger  that has high powered jets for your calves and hamstrings that is being custom built in Pennsylvania for arrival by the end of March.
Fully furnished home 2 king beds 3 queen beds.
2 Queen size futons and a Twin Sleeper even has a solid bassinet.
Has nice indoor/outdoor kitchen with 2 grills, huge frig, sink with extra hot line and prep cooler. and  back yard and 4 parking spaces on back driveway.
Old Littleton 2 level house house Brand new stack-able W+D included upstairs in walk-in closet and full size washer dryer high end set downstairs.
Also included that are already set up are 2 wall mount 65" Ultra HDTV's one on main level and one downstairs.
Sky lights in the kitchen and bathroom.
with large driveway parking for 4 cars.
No garage available-Landlord keeps garage.
If you want the garage which is 3 car which would run an additional $1500/mo.
10 blocks from the Littleton light rail station and Downtown Littleton.
Mountain Views Private Deck 5 piece bath.
Incredible Mountain views from your 2 person jetted tub and copper double sinks and awesome 5 piece bath vaulted ceiling.
Master executive loft suite is super private away from the rest of the house in a private wing setting.
Massive Walk in closet with your own private brand new stack able washer and dryer.
Bedroom has a 2 way gas fireplace.
Also has 2 way gas fireplace in master suite and adjoining living room.
Master suite has private 2nd floor deck great for sunbathing and romantic cook outs for two.
ALL OF FURITURE AND 2 NEW TVS ALL INCLUDED.
IF YOU HAVE ALL OF YOUR OWN STUFF BE HAPPY TO RENT THIS HOUSE EMPTY
BUT THE RENTAL RATE WOULD BE THE SAME.
month with $4999 Security Deposit.
REQUIRED 2 YEAR LEASE.
Discounts available for additional years signed past the base 2 years.
All utilities will be paid by tenants.
1st months rent and deposit must be paid at lease signing and move in and key codes of your choice.
Top of the line key pad entry code locks so no keys to carry around.
The front part of the house that is completely separate from back part that is a 2 bedroom 1 bath is rented until 8/15/22 to a single man.
When he moves out you will have 1st choice on that space but it rents for an additional $2500/mo.
Close to Windimere and Ridge road call JDV 72zero 35seven 202nine
